verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H899>him,<s%> and the garments, and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread;<s%>
and <S%H6950>assemble<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H5712>at<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5712>him;<s%> and the congregation was <S%H6950>assembled<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> "This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H6213>done.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7364>washed<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

He <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> on <S%H2296>him,<s%> tied the <S%H73>sash<s%> on <S%H3847>him,<s%> clothed him with the <S%H4598>robe,<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> on <S%H2296>him,<s%> and he tied the skillfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> on <S%H640>him,<s%> and fastened it to him with it.
He <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> on <S%H2833>him;<s%> and in the breastplate he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H224>Urim<s%> and the <S%H8550>Thummim.<s%>

He <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H4701>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head;<s%> and on the <S%H4701>turban,<s%> in <S%H6440>front,<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6731>plate,<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and all that was in <S%H6942>it,<s%> and sanctified them.

He <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and the <S%H3595>basin<s%> and its <S%H3653>base,<s%> to sanctify <S%H6942>them.<s%>
He <S%H3332>poured<s%> some of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H6942>him,<s%> to sanctify him.

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> them with <S%H3801>coats,<s%> and <S%H2296>tied<s%> <S%H73>sashes<s%> on <S%H2280>them,<s%> and put <S%H4021>headbands<s%> on <S%H3068>them;<s%> as Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H5066>brought<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

He <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H4872>it;<s%> and Moses <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H2398>purified<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> out the <S%H1818>blood<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H3722>it,<s%> to make atonement for it.

He <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that was on the <S%H7130>innards,<s%> and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and their <S%H2459>fat;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burned<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

But the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and its <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and its <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and its <S%H6569>dung,<s%> he <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>
He <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H4872>it;<s%> and Moses <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
He <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> into its <S%H5409>pieces;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burned<s%> the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and the <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and the <S%H6309>fat.<s%>

He <S%H7364>washed<s%> the <S%H7130>innards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> with <S%H4325>water;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burned<s%> the whole <S%H352>ram<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> It was a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma.<s%> It was an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>

He <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H4872>it;<s%> and Moses <S%H3947>took<s%> some of its <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

He <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and the fat <S%H451>tail,<s%> and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that was on the <S%H7130>innards,<s%> and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and their <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh;<s%>

and out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> that was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake,<s%> and one <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H8081>oiled<s%> <S%H259>bread,<s%> and one <S%H7550>wafer,<s%> and <S%H7760>placed<s%> them on the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh.<s%>

He <S%H5414>put<s%> all these in <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H3709>hands<s%> and in his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H5130>waved<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them from their <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H6999>burned<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%> They were a <S%H4394>consecration<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma.<s%> It was an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2373>breast,<s%> and <S%H5130>waved<s%> it for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> It was <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H4490>portion<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> some of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> which was on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> it on <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> on his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H899>garments<s%> with <S%H6942>him,<s%> and sanctified <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' garments with <S%H899>him.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H1310>"Boil<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and there <S%H398>eat<s%> it and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> that is in the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H175><s%> 'Aaron and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall eat <S%H398>it.<s%>'
What <S%H3498>remains<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

You shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> until the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H4394>consecration<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled:<s%> for he shall <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
What has been <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> so <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> to make atonement for <S%H3722>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H3427>stay<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3119>days,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4931>command,<s%> that you <S%H4191>don't<s%> die: for so I am <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"
<S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> all the <S%H1697>things<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
